actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Supporting the efforts to establish a moderate and tolerant political system in Afghanistan that is protective of the rights and dignity of all communities.

summary.text: Supports the efforts to establish a moderate and tolerant political system in Afghanistan that is protective of the rights and dignity of all communities and which allows for the election of local, regional, and national leaders representative of all communities.

titles.title: Supporting the efforts to establish a moderate and tolerant political system in Afghanistan that is protective of the rights and dignity of all communities.
Supporting the efforts to establish a moderate and tolerant political system in Afghanistan that is protective of the rights and dignity of all communities.
